posts.title: Updates
posts.body: I moved to storing the posts and comments in a JSON file rather than a sqlite3 file. **Hopefully this will help prevent posts from deleting themselves.**

posts.title: Hopefully fixed somethings
posts.body:
- Added HTML sanitizer
- Fixed posts and comments deleting themselves (hopefully)
- Fixed other errors (Hopefully)

posts.title: I probably wont ever use this
posts.body: Yeah I created thes post thinys but nevr use them lol.
